project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project consists of the equipment to be procured and works to be undertaken during the years 1972-73, i.e., acquisition of diesel locomotives and freight cars, strengthening of couplers, modernization of rail cars, realignment of the Port Dickson line, track renewal and workshop modernization, and studies to improve cost accounting and operational efficiency. Including contingencies, the total cost of the project is estimated at US$23 million equivalent, with a foreign exchange component of about US$18 million equivalent.
